document_data.mainbody:
Odelia was the lady-in-waiting who served Lady Arietta of House Seasilver during the late 15 century DR.
She was a dutiful attendant, seeing to all of Lady Ariettas needs without complaint.
When Marsember was assaulted by the shades of Netheril, on Uktar 2 of the , Odelia was directed to stay behind at the familys city estate while the nobles and their soldiers fled to Elversult. While Arietta tried to smuggle Odelia aboard the familys ship within one of her larger trunks, they did not act swiftly enough. Odelia was slain by a shade that made its way into Lady Ariettas chambers within the Seasilver estate.
